name: The sum of even two-digit positive and three-digit negative numbers of the array
instruction:
The `sumEven3DigPositiveAnd2DigNegative` function takes one parameter, the `arr` array.

The array is of arbitrary length and consists of positive and negative integers.

The function returns the sum of even two-digit positive and three-digit negative integers in the array.

Correct the errors in the code so that the function works correctly.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
sumEven3DigPositiveAnd2DigNegative([20, 30, 40, -100, -110]) // 20 + 30 + 40 + (-100) + (-110) = -120
sumEven3DigPositiveAnd2DigNegative([-20, -30, -40, 100, 110]) // 0
sumEven3DigPositiveAnd2DigNegative([1, 2, 18, 13, 90, 100, -102, 3000]) // 18 + 90 + (-102) = 6
```
